project1.title: Tonic
project1.description: A daily selection of privately personalized reads; no accounts or sign-ups required.

project2.title: Multi-Post Stories
project2.description: Experimental content creation feature that allows users to add to an existing story over the course of a day without spamming their friends.

project3.title: Facebook 360
project3.description: Exploring the future of media in Facebook's first Virtual Reality app; a place to discover and enjoy 360 photos and videos on Gear VR.

project4.title: Uber Navigation
project4.description: A smart assistant to make driving more safe, efficient, and fun by unlocking your most expensive computer: your car.
